ygData.subject: Re: Two More Decepticons to Deal With/Galactor Jets
ygData.msgSnippet: Only the Vycir/Flare jet is cloaked. ... The Supernova/Slasys/Scrap jet rolls out of the way of the fire, firing two missiles at cutthroat and heading up. From

Only the Vycir/Flare jet is cloaked.

::Lavatron/Glactors::

The Supernova/Slasys/Scrap jet rolls out of the way of the fire,
firing two missiles at cutthroat and heading up. From behind
Cutthroat, the Vycir/Flare jet fires two grenades, that prematurely
explode on either side of Cutthroat (at least if he stays still).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Lavatron is hit by two blasts from either side, stumbling around for a
sec before seperating into the seperate bots.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Astral flies upward, firing two missiles at Triggerhappy.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Starlight also flies up, but fires two missiles at Surgital's head.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Griplash, landing on the ground and taking out his missile launcher,
fires a missile at each of Surgital's legs.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recklessa flies up in the air, firing two missiles at Surgital's
chest.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Cutthroat::
> 
>       Triggerhappy landed by the CF, where the Stunticons were. 
Skullgrin and Blowpipe hopped out, then Triggerhappy transformed to
robot mode.  Blowpipe reverted into Triggerhappy's compressed air
cannon.  Skullgrin and Triggerhappy smiled.
> 
>         "Time to slag some Autobots!" Skullgrin said.
> 
>          Skullgrin transformed to his shrapnel-blasting assault tank
mode, and fired 2 blasts up at Lavatron.  Triggerhappy did fancy
little movements with his cannon around his wrist and stuff, then took
hold of it and fired 3 shots at the CF.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>           Cutthroat transformed to creature mode and flew out of the
way of the grenades.  Then, he flapped his wings hard to hover, and
opened his beak and out came a stream of fire, heading for the
Slasys/Supernova/Scrap jet.
